title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 7B.08 - School Sign (S1-1) and Plaques
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 7B.08 - School Sign (S1-1) and Plaques

State Regulations
DELETE Item B of Paragraph 02. INSERT the following paragraph: Support: 01A New York State Law does not define "School Zone" other
than in conjunction with "Drug Free School Zones" (Highway Law Section
317). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
7B.08

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
